summary.span: 管理当前线程的执行上下文。

span.span: Manages the execution context for the current thread.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为与执行的逻辑线程相关的所有信息提供单个容器。The class provides a single container for all information relevant to a logical thread of execution. 这包括安全上下文、调用上下文和同步上下文。This includes security context, call context, and synchronization context. 类提供用户代码用于跨用户定义的异步点捕获和传输此上下文的功能。The class provides the functionality for user code to capture and transfer this context across user-defined asynchronous points. 公共语言运行时确保在 托管进程内的运行时定义的异步点之间一致传输。The common language runtime ensures that the is consistently transferred across runtime-defined asynchronous points within the managed process. 执行上下文是 COM 单元的托管等效项。An execution context is the managed equivalent of a COM apartment. 在应用程序域中，只要传输线程，就必须传输整个执行上下文。Within an application domain, the entire execution context must be transferred whenever a thread is transferred. 这种情况发生在方法进行的传输过程中 ，大多数线程池操作和通过 Windows 消息泵 Windows 窗体线程封送处理。This situation occurs during transfers made by the method, most thread pool operations, and Windows Forms thread marshaling through the Windows message pump. 它不会在不安全的线程池操作中出现 (如 方法) ，这不会传输压缩的堆栈。It does not occur in unsafe thread pool operations (such as the method), which do not transfer the compressed stack. 在压缩堆栈流动的任何位置，托管的主体、同步、区域设置和用户上下文也会流动。Wherever the compressed stack flows, the managed principal, synchronization, locale, and user context also flow. 类提供 和 方法来获取执行上下文和 方法，以设置当前线程的执行上下文。The class provides the and methods to get the execution context and the method to set the execution context for the current thread. 无法在另一个线程上设置与线程关联的。An that is associated with a thread cannot be set on another thread. 尝试这样做将导致引发异常。Attempting to do so will result in an exception being thrown. 若要将 从一个线程传播到另一个线程，请创建的副本 。To propagate the from one thread to another, make a copy of the . 在内部，将 存储与相关联的所有数据 。Internally, the stores all data that is associated with the . 这允许在 复制和传输时传播数据 。This allows the data to be propagated when the is copied and transferred.

summary.span: 从当前线程捕获执行上下文。

span.span: Captures the execution context from the current thread.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示当前线程的执行上下文。

span.span: An object representing the execution context for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捕获的执行上下文可用作 `executionContext` 方法的参数 。The captured execution context can be used as the `executionContext` parameter for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.ExecutionContext CreateCopy() cil managed

summary.span: 创建当前执行上下文的副本。

span.span: Creates a copy of the current execution context.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示当前执行上下文。

span.span: An object representing the current execution context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于将执行上下文从一个线程传播到另一个线程。This method is useful for propagating an execution context from one thread to another.

exception.span: 此上下文正在使用，无法进行复制。

span.span: This context cannot be copied because it is used.

exception.span: 只能复制新捕获的上下文。

span.span: Only newly captured contexts can be copied.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 `Dispose` ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

summary.span: 将捕获的执行上下文还原到当前线程。

span.span: Restores a captured execution context on to the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恢复为当前执行上下文;请在调用 Restore 之前捕获它，然后再次调用还原。To revert to the current execution context; capture it before calling Restore, and then call Restore it again.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RestoreFlow() cil managed

summary.span: 恢复执行上下文在异步线程之间的流动。

span.span: Restores the flow of the execution context across asynchronous threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反转先前方法调用的效果 。 reverses the effect of a prior method call. 此方法由 方法返回的结构的方法调用 。This method is called by the method of the structure returned by the method. 应使用 方法还原执行上下文的流，而不是 方法。You should use the method to restore the flow of the execution context, not the method.

exception.span: 上下文流尚未取消，无法还原。

span.span: The context flow cannot be restored because it is not being suppressed.

summary.span: 在当前线程上的指定执行上下文中运行某个方法。

span.span: Runs a method in a specified execution context on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当方法完成时，执行上下文将恢复为其以前的状态。The execution context is returned to its previous state when the method completes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl SuppressFlow() cil managed
Public Shared Function SuppressFlow () As AsyncFlowControl

summary.span: 取消执行上下文在异步线程之间的流动。

span.span: Suppresses the flow of the execution context across asynchronous threads.

returns.span: 用于恢复流动的 结构。

span.span: An structure for restoring the flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可取消 当前线程上的流。Use this method to suppress the flow of the on the current thread. 您必须对 返回的结构使用方法 来还原的流 。You must use the method on the returned structure to restore the flow of the . 此方法使用 for 权限进行保护 。This method is protected with a for permission. 完全受信任的组件可以调用此方法，以在 异步调用期间禁止显示流。A fully trusted component can call this method to suppress the flow of the during asynchronous calls. 当流被取消时，该 方法返回 `null` 。While the flow is suppressed, the method returns `null`.

span.span: The context flow is already suppressed.
